Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Karachi airport in Pakistan halts all international arrivals due to coronavirus, when in fact international flights generally arrived without interruption at Jinnah International Airport on February 27, 2020.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that international flights were not halted at Karachi airport due to coronavirus on February 27, 2020.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading Facebook post and a photo that does not accurately represent the situation at Karachi airport.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo and caption on Facebook accurately represent the situation at Karachi airport, which is not supported by the evidence provided.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the photo and claim on Facebook were misleading and did not accurately reflect the situation at Karachi airport.
